properties.name: columnHeaders
properties.description: displays a column header on every column when using the miller view.
properties.rawdescription: displays a column header on every column when using the miller view.

properties.name: groupsOnly
properties.description: Set this to true, if the selector should only show groups.
properties.rawdescription: Set this to true, if the selector should only show groups.

properties.name: groupsSelectable
properties.description: Set this true, if groups should be selectable.
properties.rawdescription: Set this true, if groups should be selectable.

properties.name: index
properties.description: Used only for miller-view, displays the column level for the current node. E.g if the index is one, this will be second column.
properties.rawdescription:
Used only for miller-view, displays the column level for the current node.
E.g if the index is one, this will be second column.

properties.name: label
properties.description: Defines a label to be shown to the user.
properties.rawdescription: Defines a label to be shown to the user.

properties.name: modelMode
properties.description: In simple model-mode the result will only contain the IDs and name of the selected assets. In full mode, everything is contained.
properties.rawdescription:
In simple model-mode the result will only contain the IDs and name of the selected
assets. In full mode, everything is contained.

properties.name: multi
properties.rawdescription: Can the user select multiple assets.

properties.name: preventInitialSelect
properties.description: Prevents automatic asset selection on component initialization.
properties.rawdescription: Prevents automatic asset selection on component initialization.

properties.name: required
properties.description: Set to true to mark it as required on a form.
properties.rawdescription: Set to true to mark it as required on a form.

properties.name: search
properties.description: Enable to display global search in the asset-selector (only possible whithout device context).
properties.rawdescription: Enable to display global search in the asset-selector (only possible whithout device context).

properties.name: selectedColumns
properties.description: Used only for single column, the array contains all selected columns.
properties.rawdescription: Used only for single column, the array contains all selected columns.

properties.name: showChildDevices
properties.description: Devices with children can be selected to show their child devices.
properties.rawdescription: Devices with children can be selected to show their child devices.

properties.name: showFilter
properties.description: displays a filter input on every column when using the miller view.
properties.rawdescription: displays a filter input on every column when using the miller view.

properties.name: showSelected
properties.description: Allows to show chips at the top with the currently selected asset for multi select. For single select it shows the currently selected asset.
properties.rawdescription:
Allows to show chips at the top with the currently selected asset for multi select.
For single select it shows the currently selected asset.

properties.name: showUnassignedDevices
properties.description: Displays all unassigned devices in a custom root group.
properties.rawdescription: Displays all unassigned devices in a custom root group.

properties.name: view
properties.description: Set the view of the asset selector with tree view as default.
properties.rawdescription: Set the view of the asset selector with tree view as default.
